member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.AdminUI
member.summary: Provides types and members for the service application's administration UI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.AdminUI.Create
member.summary: For internal use only. Provides types and members for the service application's creation UI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.AdminUI.Manage
member.summary: For internal use only. Provides types and members for the service application's management UI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.AdminUI.Properties
member.summary: For internal use only. Provides types and members for the service application's properties UI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings
member.summary: Represents the collection of settings used for all conversions within a single conversion job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the class, using the service's default settings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.RevisionState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the revision view state for converted documents.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is Final.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.MarkupView
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the markup visibility state for converted documents.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is Comments | Ink | Text | Formatting.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.UpdateFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether fields in the document should be updated during conversion.
member.value: If true, fields are automatically updated during conversion. Otherwise, fields are not automatically updated during conversion.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.DefaultLanguage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the language used when resolving any language-dependent content within the document.
member.value: If this value is null, the default language of the site on which the document is stored is used.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.EmbedFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if fonts used by the document are saved as part of the output file.
member.value: If true, embeds fonts within the output file. Otherwise, fonts are not embedded.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.SubsetEmbeddedFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if only those characters required by the document are included in the embedded font. Ignored unless the property is true.
member.value: If true, only characters required by the document are included in the embedded font. Otherwise, the entire font is embedded.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.DoNotEmbedSystemFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if common (web safe) fonts should be included in the output file. Ignored unless the property is true.
member.value: If true, fonts considered common are not embedded in the file. Otherwise, all fonts used in the document, including common fonts, are embedded.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.CompatibilityMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the compatibility mode for the output file.
member.value: A value specifying the compatibility mode for the output file. Ignored if the output file type does not support the specified compatibility mode.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is MaintainCurrentSetting.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.AddThumbnail
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the output document is saved with an preview thumbnail. Ignored if the output file type does not support thumbnails.
member.value: If true, a thumbnail is added to the output file. Otherwise, no thumbnail is added.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.FixedFormatSettings
member.summary: Gets the collection of settings that are specific to fixed format output. Ignored if the output file type is not a fixed file format.
member.value: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.OutputFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the output file format for the conversion job.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is Automatic.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings.OutputSaveBehavior
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the behavior when the output file for a conversion already exists.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is AppendIfPossible.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.BalloonState
member.summary: Represents how revisions and markup in the output file can be displayed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.BalloonState.AlwaysUse
member.summary: Show all revisions in balloons.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.BalloonState.Inline
member.summary: Show all revisions inline with the document text.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.BalloonState.OnlyCommentsAndFormatting
member.summary: Show comments and formatting revision in balloons, all other revisions inline with the document text.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.CompatibilityMode
member.summary: Represents how the compatibility mode can be set for output files.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.CompatibilityMode.Word2003
member.summary: Use Word 97-2003 compatibility mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.CompatibilityMode.Word2007
member.summary: Use Word 2007 compatibility mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.CompatibilityMode.Word2010
member.summary: Use Word 2010 compatibility mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.CompatibilityMode.MaintainCurrentSetting
member.summary: Use the compatibility mode specified by the input file.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.CompatibilityMode.Current
member.summary: Use the most newest compatibility mode supported by the service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatQuality
member.summary: Represents the output quality that can be used for fixed format output.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatQuality.Standard
member.summary: Optimize the output for printing.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatQuality.Minimum
member.summary: Optimize the output for online reading.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatBookmark
member.summary: Represents how bookmarks can be created in fixed format output.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatBookmark.None
member.summary: Do not generate bookmarks in the fixed format output.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatBookmark.Headings
member.summary: Convert Word headings into bookmarks in the fixed format output.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatBookmark.Bookmarks
member.summary: Convert Word bookmarks into bookmarks in the fixed format output.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.RevisionState
member.summary: Represents how revisions and comments can be displayed in the output file.
member.remarks: This setting is ignored in non-fixed format output unless Word is configured to read this setting from the document.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.RevisionState.Final
member.summary: Show the final view, as though revisions were accepted and comments removed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.RevisionState.FinalShowingMarkup
member.summary: Show the final view, including all revisions and comments.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.RevisionState.Original
member.summary: Show in original view, as though revisions were rejected and comments removed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.RevisionState.OriginalShowingMarkup
member.summary: Show the original view, including all revisions and comments.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat
member.summary: Represents the supported save formats for output files.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.Automatic
member.summary: Use the file extension of the output file to determine output format.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.Document
member.summary: Save output file as a Word Document (.docx).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.DocumentMacroEnabled
member.summary: Save output file as a Word Macro-Enabled Document (.docm).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.Document97
member.summary: Save output file as a Word 97-2003 Document (.doc).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.Template
member.summary: Save output file as a Word Template (.dotx).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.TemplateMacroEnabled
member.summary: Save output file as a Word Macro-Enabled Template (.dotm).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.Template97
member.summary: Save output file as a Word 97-2003 Template (.dot).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.MHTML
member.summary: Save output file as a Single File Web Page (.mht).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.PDF
member.summary: Save output file as a PDF (.pdf).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.RTF
member.summary: Save output file as a Rich Text Format document (.rtf).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.XML
member.summary: Save output file as a Word XML Document (.xml).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveFormat.XPS
member.summary: Save output file as a XPS Document (.xps).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveBehavior
member.summary: Represents how the output file should be processed if it already exists at the output location.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveBehavior.AppendIfPossible
member.summary: Append the file as a new version to the existing document if versioning is turned on. If the output list doesn't have versioning turned on, overwrite the existing file.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveBehavior.AlwaysOverwrite
member.summary: Overwrite the existing file, even if versioning is turned on.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveBehavior.AppendOnly
member.summary: Append the file as a new version to the existing document if versioning is turned on. If the output list doesn't have versioning turned on, fail the conversion.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.SaveBehavior.NeverOverwrite
member.summary: Fail the conversion if the output file already exists.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.MarkupTypes
member.summary: Represents the types of markup that should be visible in the output document.
member.remarks: This setting is ignored in non-fixed format output unless Word is configured to read this setting from the document.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.MarkupTypes.Comments
member.summary: Show comments in the output document.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.MarkupTypes.Ink
member.summary: Show ink markup in the output document.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.MarkupTypes.Text
member.summary: Show revisions (insertions, deletions, etc.) in the output document.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.MarkupTypes.Formatting
member.summary: Show formatting revisions in the output document.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings
member.summary: Represents the collection of settings used for settings specific to fixed format output.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.OutputQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the output quality.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is Standard.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.Bookmarks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how bookmarks are saved into the output file.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is None.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.IncludeDocumentProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if document properties are saved to the output file.
member.value: If true, document properties are saved to the output file. Otherwise, no document properties are saved to the output file.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.IncludeDocumentStructure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if document structure tags are saved to the output file.
member.value: If true, document structure tags are saved to the output file. Otherwise, document structure tags are not saved to the output file.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.UsePDFA
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if PDF output should use the PDF/A format.
member.value: If true, PDF output uses the PDF/A format.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.BitmapEmbeddedFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if fonts are bitmapped and included in the output file when they cannot be embedded.
member.value: If true, fonts are bitmapped and included in the output file when they cannot be embedded. Otherwise, fonts that cannot be embedded are not included in the output file.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.FixedFormatSettings.BalloonState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the visibility of markup balloons in the output file.
member.value: A value.
member.remarks: The default value for this setting is OnlyCommentsAndFormatting.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo
member.summary: Represents details for a single conversion within a conversion job.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets a value that describes why the conversion failed.
member.value: A string describing the error condition and possible remediation steps.
member.remarks: This property is empty if the property is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.ConversionId
member.summary: Gets the conversion ID of this conversion.
member.value: A integer specifying the order in which conversions within the parent conversion job are processed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.InputFile
member.summary: Gets the path to the input file.
member.value: A string specifying the full path to the input file.
member.remarks: If the conversion was added using the or methods, the path is constructed using the default access mapping.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets the path to the output file.
member.value: A string specifying the full path to the output file.
member.remarks: If the conversion was added using the or methods, the path is constructed using the default access mapping.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets a unique error code for a failed conversion.
member.value: An integer specifying the unique error code.
member.remarks: This property should be ignored if the property is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.Canceled
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion of this item was canceled.
member.value: If true, the processing of this item was cancelled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.NotStarted
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion of this item has started.
member.value: If true, the processing of this item has not yet started (processing of the item is still pending).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.InProgress
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion of this item is in progress.
member.value: If true, the processing of this item is currently in progress.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.Succeeded
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion of this item has completed successfully.
member.value: If true, the processing of this item has completed successfully.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.Failed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion of this item has failed.
member.value: If true, the processing of this item has failed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.StartTime
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies when the processing of this item began.
member.value: A DateTime value specifying the local date and time when conversion of this item began.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionItemInfo.CompleteTime
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies when the processing of this item completed (whether the item was converted successfully or failed).
member.value: A DateTime value specifying the local date and time when conversion of this item completed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob
member.summary: Represents a group of conversions tracked as a unit.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.#ctor(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplicationProxy,Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified .
member.param: A used to communicate with the Word Automation Services service application used to run the job.
A specifying the default settings for the conversion job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.#ctor(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplicationProxy)
member.summary: Creates a new with default settings.
member.param: A used to communicate with the Word Automation Services service application used to run the job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new with default settings.
member.param: A string specifying the name of the Word Automation Services service application used to run the job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates a new with default settings.
member.param: A Guid specifying the ID of the Word Automation Services service application used to run the job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.#ctor(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified .
member.param: A string specifying the name of the Word Automation Services service application used to run the job.
A specifying the default settings for the conversion job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.#ctor(System.Guid,Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified .
member.param: A Guid specifying the ID of the Word Automation Services service application used to run the job.
A specifying the default settings for the conversion job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.AddFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file to the list of conversions performed when the method is called.
member.param: A string specifying the location of the input file. This location must be within the SharePoint farm.
A string specifying the location where the output file will be saved. This location must be within the SharePoint farm.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.AddFolder(Microsoft.SharePoint.SPFolder,Microsoft.SharePoint.SPFolder,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds all Word documents in a folder to the list of conversions performed when the method is called.
member.param: An SPFolder specifying the folder from which input files are obtained.
An SPFolder specifying the folder where output files are saved.
True to search this folder and all subfolders. Otherwise, only the current folder is searched.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.AddLibrary(Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList,Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList)
member.summary: Adds all Word documents in a library to the list of conversions performed when the method is called.
member.param: An SPList specifying the library from which input files are obtained.
An SPList specifying the library where output files are saved.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.Start
member.summary: Start the processing of the conversion job.
member.remarks: Until this method is called, none of the conversions in the conversion job are started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the current conversion job.
member.remarks: When canceled, items with status NotStarted are not processed. However, InProgress items continue executing, and completed conversions are not deleted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.CancelJob(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplicationProxy,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Cancels the specified conversion job.
member.param: A used to communicate with the Word Automation Services service running the job.
A Guid specifying the JobId of the conversion job to be cancelled.
A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription of the job's creator. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.
member.remarks: When canceled, items with status NotStarted are not processed. However, InProgress items continue executing, and completed conversions are not deleted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.CancelJob(System.String,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Cancels the specified conversion job.
member.param: A string specifying the name of the Word Automation Services service application running the job.
A Guid specifying the JobId of the conversion job to be cancelled.
A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription of the job's creator. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.CancelJob(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Cancels the specified conversion job.
member.param: A Guid specifying the ID of the Word Automation Services service application running the job.
A Guid specifying the JobId of the conversion job to be cancelled.
A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription of the job's creator. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.JobId
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the unique ID corresponding to the current conversion job.
member.value: A Guid value specifying the unique ID for the job.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.Settings
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the collection of settings used for all conversions within the job.
member.value: A object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the friendly name for the current conversion job.
member.value: A string value specifying the name for the job.
member.remarks: The default value is null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.Canceled
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion job was cancelled.
member.value: If true, the processing of this job was cancelled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.Started
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this job has been started using the method. Once started, additional files cannot be added to the conversion job.
member.value: If true, the processing of this job has started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.UserToken
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the user credentials used to retrieve input files and save output files for the conversion job.
member.value: An SPUserToken value that specifies the user credentials.
member.remarks: The default value is null, which uses Anonymous access.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJob.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the site subscription of the conversion job.
member.value: A Guid value that specifies the subscription ID for the user's site subscription.
member.remarks: The default value is null, which means that the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo
member.summary: Represents details for a single conversion job.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo.JobId
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the unique ID corresponding to the current conversion job.
member.value: A Guid value specifying the unique ID for the job.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo.SubmittedTime
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies when the job was submitted.
member.value: A DateTime value specifying the local date and time when the job was submitted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo.Canceled
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the conversion job was cancelled.
member.value: If true, the processing of this job was cancelled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo.CancelTime
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies when the job was cancelled.
member.value: A DateTime value specifying the local date and time when the job was canceled. If it was not canceled, returns null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo.PartiallySubmitted
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the job is partially submitted. Partially submitted conversion jobs are not processed until complete.
member.value: If true, the job is currently being submitted, or encountered an error before it was fully submitted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the friendly name for the current conversion job.
member.value: A string value specifying the name for the job.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus
member.summary: Represents the state of an existing conversion job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.#ctor(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplicationProxy,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Get the status for a single conversion job. A job can only be queried using the same credentials passed to the property at creation time, or those of a farm administrator.
member.param: A used to communicate with the Word Automation Services service application being queried.
A Guid specfifying the unique ID of the conversion job being queried.
A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription used to filter the job list. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.#ctor(System.String,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Get the status for a single conversion job. A job can only be queried using the same credentials passed to the property at creation time, or those of a farm administrator.
member.param: A string specifying the name of the Word Automation Services service application being queried.
A Guid specfifying the unique ID of the conversion job being queried.
A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription used to filter the job list. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.

members.member: Get the status for a single conversion job. A job can only be queried using the same credentials passed to the property at creation time, or those of a farm administrator.> A Guid specifying the ID of the Word Automation Services service application being queried. A Guid specfifying the unique ID of the conversion job being queried. A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription used to filter the job list. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.GetItems(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes)
member.summary: Get information about particular groups of items within the conversion job, based on their final status.
member.param: An value that specifies the type(s) of items to retrieve.
member.returns: A collection of objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.Refresh
member.summary: Refresh the status of the conversion job.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.GetAllActiveJobs(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplicationProxy,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Get all conversion jobs with one or more active items (items with a status of InProgress or NotStarted).
member.param: A used to communicate with the Word Automation Services service application being queried.
A Guid specifying the ID for the site subscription used to filter the job list. If the SharePoint farm was not set up for multiple site subscriptions, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: A collection of ID values corresponding to the job ID values for active conversion jobs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.GetAllActiveJobs(Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplicationProxy,Microsoft.SharePoint.SPUserToken,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Get all conversion jobs with one or more active items (items with a status of InProgress or NotStarted).

member.returns: A collection of ID values corresponding to the job ID values for active conversion jobs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.Count
member.summary: Gets the total number of items in this job.
member.value: An integer specifying the total number of conversion items in the job.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.NotStarted
member.summary: Gets the total number of items that have not yet been processed within this job.
member.value: An integer specifying the total number of conversion items with a status of NotStarted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.InProgress
member.summary: Gets the total number of items that are currently processing within this job.
member.value: An integer specifying the total number of conversion items with a status of InProgress.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.Succeeded
member.summary: Gets the total number of items that have completed successfully within this job.
member.value: An integer specifying the total number of conversion items with a status of Succeeded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.Canceled
member.summary: Gets the total number of items that have been canceled within this job.
member.value: An integer specifying the total number of conversion items with a status of Canceled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.Failed
member.summary: Gets the total number of items that have failed within this job.
member.value: An integer specifying the total number of conversion items with a status of Failed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ConversionJobStatus.Name
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the friendly name for the current conversion job.
member.value: A string specifying the name for the job.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes
member.summary: Represents the categories of items that can be retrieved using the method.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes.Succeeded
member.summary: Represents items that have completed successfully.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes.InProgress
member.summary: Represents items that are currently being processed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes.NotStarted
member.summary: Represents items that have not yet been processed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes.Failed
member.summary: Represents items that have failed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Conversions.ItemTypes.Canceled
member.summary: Represents items that have been canceled.

member.summary: Unprovisions the service application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.Delete
member.summary: Deletes the service application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.Database
member.summary: Gets or sets the database used by the service application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.WordServiceFormats
member.summary: Gets or sets the enabled/disabled state for each file format supported by the service application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.ConversionsPerInstance
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of conversions assigned to a conversion process each time the timer job executes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.ConversionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum length of time that a conversion can execute before it is aborted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.TimerJobFrequency
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the frequency with which documents in the queue are dispatched for conversion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.KeepAliveTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum length of time that the conversion can be non-responsive before it is aborted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.MaximumConversionTime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the length of time that a conversion can can execute before it is aborted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.MaximumConversionAttempts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of times a conversion will be restarted upon failure before it is marked Failed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.DisableEmbeddedFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if font embedding can be performed. If this setting is true, the property has no effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.DisableBinaryFileScan
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether binary documents loaded by the service are subject to additional security validation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.MaximumMemoryUsage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum percentage of memory that can be consumed by the service application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.RecycleProcessThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the number of Word documents converted before the conversion process is recycled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.TotalActiveProcesses
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the number of conversion processes running per server running the service application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Office.Word.Server.Service.WordServiceApplication.TypeName
member.summary: Gets a value specifying the object's type name.
member.value: A string specifying the type name for the object, used in Central Administration to show the object's type.

member.remarks: The default value for this setting is true.
